body_html: Hey there, sorry for the long delay on this. Apparently my thoughts on how to easily do this would need some deeper changes (e.g. to allow bool as ref's dtype for scatter_nd_add). Closing this for now.
body_text: Hey there, sorry for the long delay on this. Apparently my thoughts on how to easily do this would need some deeper changes (e.g. to allow bool as ref's dtype for scatter_nd_add). Closing this for now.
body: Hey there, sorry for the long delay on this. Apparently my thoughts on how to easily do this would need some deeper changes (e.g. to allow [bool as ref's dtype for scatter_nd_add](https://source.cloud.google.com/results/invocations/356de39b-1dba-4e22-9cc7-780fe0fcc906/targets/%2F%2Ftensorflow%2Fpython%2Fkernel_tests:sparse_ops_test/log)). Closing this for now.
